name: Caliper
description: It is malleable iron frame printed, dark plated spindle. It can measure accurate number in carpentry work.

name: Hand Saw
description: This hand saw has a high speed carbon steel blade with insert Moulded plastic Handle. The cutting edges are too sharp.

name: Marking Gauge
description: It has the capability to tell the fitted measurement of an object that helps a woodworker to build a product.

name: Pliers
description: This tool has a Carbon Steel/Crv bright chrome metal body with natural polish and PVC sleeve to cut anything out.

name: Steel Nail
description: This nails are made with steel. It is strong enough to hold many objects also the durability is good enough.

name: Hammer
description: It is a Steel Handle With Rubber Grip, Carbon Steel, Polished Head hammer. This hammer is strong enough to crush any object

name: Electric Jigsaw
description: This Electric Jigsaw tool is suitable for cutting wood/ plastic plates / metal plates / stainless steel plates/ aluminum plates

name: Woodwork Tools
description: This package is the collection of various wood cutting tools. These are used in cutting and reshaping woods and wood product.
